name: SpaceGuru
0:
”Alexa, open Space Guru”
”random fact”
”tell me a space fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space guru
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use Alexa to learn great, quick, fun facts about space! Alexa Show users will get a special visual treat.

Coming Soon—November 2018
 • Beat the Guru—Test your space wits and see if you can beat the Guru or play a multiplayer game.
 • Ask anything about any planet, stars, constellations and more!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
